name: WOLF HUNTER
description:
A supreme warrior arrives to town to save people from Wolf attacks.  but the main troubles Begins 

the quest and story based on the follow adventure

A main boss of wolfeites came to the cabbies village and destroying then 

enjoy the game  with aswome looking  characters and other stuffs

HOW TO PLAY :

MOUST LEFT : point to click for actions

MOUSE SCROLL WHEEL : Zoom in  or zoom Out

MOUSE  RIGHT : Hold it for camera movement

MOUSE MOVEMENT : mouse player 

To USE SKILLS 

first assign the skills 

then press 

alpha 1 to use skill in first slot

alpha 2 to use skill in second slot
alpha 3 to use skill in third slot
alpha 4 to use skill in fourth slot
alpha 5 to use skill in five slot
alpha 6 to use skill in Six slot
